name: The Theodore Adventures
description: Help the little Theodore reach Juicy Island, immerse yourself in classical retro style 80's, accumulate coins to proceed between mysterious island levels. Be quick and do not stop.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Cpu dual core 2,5 Ghz or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: intel Hd 4000 \ ati series 7000 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 177 MB available space Sound Card: Common sound card
